title: Did the CEO of Hardwick Claus break ties with the National Football Association about the "national" protests?
subtitle: The news reports accurately describe a decision taken by Tennessee Alan Jones' businessman.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In September 2017, a businessman from Tennessee and Executive Director Hardwick Claus Allan Jones withdrew all announcements concerning the National Football Association of its companies, in response to the protests of the "non-national" national anthem.
